channel.title: WebXR on GraphWiz
channel.description: Recent content in WebXR on GraphWiz

item.title: Immersive WebXR Experience
item.description: This immersive WebXR experience is designed to introduce newcomers to the world of Virtual Reality. The experience is accessible via a single click from a WebXR-enabled browser. The application represents a good demonstration for comfortable VR accessibility. It utilizes the WebXR technology, a collaborative effort from a consortium including Google, Microsoft, and Mozilla, among other industry leaders. This interface replaces the outdated WebVR 1.1 standard, which suffered from various limitations and was restricted to Virtual Reality applications.
